website_summaries.verdict: The feisty Patches sports intriguing patches of pink and blue fur and helps you to express your individuality.
pros: Twist-lock tail lets you attach to arm or backpack
Light-up eyes change color with Patch's mood
Touch nose or pet to activate
Up to 50 reactions and games, including freeze dance
cons: Keeping it wrapped around your arm may be challenging

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 4 year old LOVES this toy. Its little voice is really adorable and the interactive nature is so fun. Great learning tools for kids - remembering what to do for which color eyes is a good skill. And nurturing the "pet" is a really important lesson. The dance party setting is great! We are having a blast playing with this toy. I can definitely see this being the hot toy this year. Edit: changed from 5 to 3 stars. 3 days after getting it, the battery died. I replaced it and it is not working nearly as well. Flashing in and out with weird sounds. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DEEC Elk

customer_reviews.title: Cheap toy
customer_reviews.text: In the photos it looks so cute and soft and is supposed to be a hot toy this holiday season so I bought two. I was surprised when I received them how small they are but also the fur is very rough, it isn't soft at all. I sent both back, they are not worth the $15 each I paid, looks like something I could have bought at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as expected... Doesnt actually stay on arm like photos show. Daughter opened it for her birthday and haven't played with it since.... I think the cats liked it more then her.
customer_reviews.author: stefasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Pomsie! It was so easy for her to "get" right away - we just took it out of the box and she started playing. She really loves brushing her hair. The price point makes it a great gift idea too.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Most favorite gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: She LOVES her Pomsie! She hasn't put it down since she opened it. Even this young, she figured out how it works.
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for an 8 year olds birthday and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: JanO

customer_reviews.title: Has it been played with?
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not happy that the item arrived without the battery protector attached. This item is going to be a gift and I don't know if the battery will fail because it has been played with or not. The other one I paid much less for arrived with the tab still in the battery. Paid a premium price for it, expected it to arrive as the one I paid less for did.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lahmann

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. I'm not sure what it does yet since I bought it as a Christmas gift for my kid but Amazon assures me it's going to be a top toy this year....
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kay

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so cute! I bought it for my 3 year old and she now drags it everywhere with her. It’s basically like a fluffy kitty head with a giant long tail that can wrap around things. Kind of like a fingerling for your arm. The kitty has a soft fur texture and they each have their own coloring.The kitty has its own personality that varies based on how you treat it. It’s eyes light up based on its mood, and the critter makes cute noises too. The price is perfect and this makes a great present, especially for Christmas coming up!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Awful Knockoff-stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Item was a kickoff and doesn’t do anything! The nose “button” isn’t actually a button just a stationary piece of plastic. The “Pomsie” doesn’t sing, make noise, light up eyes, nothing! The eyes are even different than the original Pomsies. There was also a singed/burned place on it. Gross. Do NOT buy from this seller!! Will be returning and not giving as a gift for my daughter’s friend’s birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Mccall

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Christmas morning !
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for Christmas gift, 1st one opened is a dud. She was excited for it too. :( Hopefully the other one isn't a dud. Stay tuned. Update: The second one opened worked. However doesn't take away the disappointment of the 1st child. It seems since I bought these early, the return window has expired. :( I was advised to check with manufacturer. Be careful shopping early.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: looks nice..
customer_reviews.text: looks nice...to give as a gift at Christmas so not sure how it works yet but really pretty and hope my niece will love it...heard it's supposed to be one of the top toys this Christmas so got it early before the price increases or it goes out of stock!
customer_reviews.author: Candice B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter four Christmas as Amazon recommended it as one of the seasons top gifts. It's really cute. My daughter loves out and likes taking care of it and thinks the dance function and tooting 🙄 are awesome. The only negative I would say is the detailed directions that come with it. It's a lot. The different colored eyes mean different things and then there are specific instructions on how to help the kitty. But other than that it's a big hit here.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Ames

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get it. It looks like a cat head on a backbone and the songs it sings and green light up eyes are uber creepy but hey my 5 year old loves it and I’m assuming it’s probably not actually possessed...? I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Cathee

customer_reviews.title: It's So Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Pomsies Patches is so totally cute and easy to play with/activate. It makes cute noises when it is on and my cat, Stormy, has been known to steal it a time or two. The fur is soft and easy to wipe clean and the toy is quite durable. Mine still works even after Stormy knocked it off the shelves numerous times. I am quite pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Pearl

customer_reviews.title: My seven year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: The item didn’t look too cute out of the package. They give you a comb to fluff the hair and it is so cute. Item is similar to a hatchimal. But a lot less expensive. My 7 yr old loves it. Very interactive.
customer_reviews.author: shelltoelle

customer_reviews.title: Pomsie does not work
customer_reviews.text: I order two Pomsies for my granddaughters for Christmas. When I started wrapping them this morning for Christmas I discovered one did not work. Too late to return. I wish manufactures and Amazon would realize many Grandma's start ordering Christmas gifts early. There should be a box to check if it's a Christmas gift in order to have an extended the return window. What's a Grandmother to do if the gift had been opened Christmas morning one worked and the other did not?
customer_reviews.author: Wittywitch

customer_reviews.title: One of the Cutest Pomsies - Patches
customer_reviews.text: We bought 5 Pomsies as Christmas gifts this year. They are softer than last year's popular interactive toy: Fingerlings. I'm hoping these will appeal to the children who prefer softer, more cuddly toys. Pomies are interactive and very cute. They all look very much alike, except for the colors, but you know kids, they'll try to collect one in every color. We are looking forward to sharing joy with these at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Murdock

customer_reviews.title: I know it will be a fun, unique gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute, interactive toy. You push it's nose, and it says several different things, and even sings. It's eyes also light up, and change colors. I know it will be a fun, for my niece, as a "just because" gift.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: Basically a Cat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anyone looking for a cat that wraps around their arm, which my daughter, goddaughter, and niece were all apparently doing this holiday season. I got rave reviews and confetti parades from the little gals in my life for this gift. Personally, I am not a cat person, so having something purring that is on my person all day is not appealing, but I am not a 6-year-old girl.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Smith Mount

customer_reviews.title: Kitty cuddler
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year-old love to comb it and attach it to her arm or backpack. She really like the color changing eyes and the purring sound. Fun for 3-5 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving a Pomsie toy to each of our 7 yr old twin granddaughters for their birthdays. They love kittens and I can see them attaching it to their book bags for school.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Anne Ross

customer_reviews.title: Cute but my kids lost interest quickly.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, product seemed well made for the price. Reason I'm giving it 3 stars is because my 4 and 8 yr old both had nearly zero interest in playing with them. And they do love other types of "stuffies" like Pikmi pops, hatchimals, etc. so I'm just not sure why they did not really enjoy these items.
customer_reviews.author: S. Swain

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Can’t give 5 only because they are Christmas gifts and haven’t been used yet.. but they look fantastic and I think my kids will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Donna R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: Was the hit toy of Christmas this year at our house. The nose got stuck pressed in once, but you can just pull it back out with some pliers/teeth/whatever and it's worked great since. Been through 2 sets of batteries already since it gets played with so often.
customer_reviews.author: The_Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very cute my son loves it he is one year old and enjoys the sounds the purring vibrations and the bright colorful light up eyes the brush is a little too small for him to have yet though
customer_reviews.author: Anna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 one for my daugther and one for my niece. I have to say they are so cute. This is an interactive toy. It tells you how it feels for example if it is hungry and it has a play mode too.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda E. Vega

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy. My granddaughter loves it. The eyes change color depending on the mood and it talks gibberish. The only thing I wish is that there was an on/off button because it goes off in the middle of the night it she takes it to bed with her and rolls on it.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and honestly I play with it more than anything because it makes me happy! Strangest thing, it’s little “doo doo - doo doo” song really just makes me feel better. I love that they eyes change color and seems to respond to touch. Best part is you can turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute toy! The eyes light up and change color depending on what your pet needs. They make music and like to have you dance with them. They have a wire in their plush tail that you use to wrap it around your arm. My kiddo didn’t like that it kept slipping around, but we couldn’t get it much tighter.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Since day one this itwm has never worked. I tried to put new batteries in and still doesnt work. I looked at a you tube video to see how to turn it on and ir does nothi h. If i could give it no stars i would. My child was disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Chad Calver

customer_reviews.title: Fun but simple!
customer_reviews.text: Two four year olds in our family live these. They’re simple enough for them to remember what the colors mean but complex enough to keep them entertained. They’re also cute and not obnoxious like a lot of similar toys.
customer_reviews.author: N.T.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute and fun little toy for kids. My 3-year old granddaughter loves it!! It's interactive and the eyes light up and she finds that very amusing!! Provides lots of entertaintainment!
customer_reviews.author: cmansour

customer_reviews.title: One worked. One didn’t.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these quite a while before Christmas. On Christmas Day we found that one was defective and did not work. It was past the window of time to return it. So we had one disappointed granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: JC.

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive sweet toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for the price and was shipped on time. Very happy overall thus far
customer_reviews.author: Bryce'smom

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit in our home!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for my 8 year old daughter, she absolutely loved it. I fully expected her interest in it to wane but 2 months later she's still playing with it, as are my other two children ages 5 and 2.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed over the pompsie kitty cat😡
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the toy. It arrived poorly packaged, the toy was not as described and its a fake to the original one . That makes little noises and is very soft and plushy. I had a hard time finding the right batteries and didn't not make any kitty noises😔😔😡
customer_reviews.author: gabi visel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Such a waste of money. My 5 year old loves toys like this, but she says this one doesn’t respond well and the color of the eyes make no sense. Disappointed. Spend this money somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Allieloveshealth

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 different ones for my twin 5 yr old granddaughters and my 10 yr old granddaughter. ALL of them LOVED them.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Shank

customer_reviews.title: She wasn't thrilled
customer_reviews.text: My DD is 7. These are the things she didn't like about the toy. It wouldn't stay upright on her wrist. The tail doesn't wrap around snugly. It was annoying that it didn't function like it should
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Cute little pet for a three year old. Fun for a few minutes of play on and off here and there but doesn’t keep anyone entertained for long. Great product for the price point of 15$.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley E.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely adores this thing! I’ll be purchasing more in the other colors for her for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with my nieces
customer_reviews.text: My nieces loved these and had a fun time discovering all the different modes on these toys! They're eyes light up different colors and there are different modes like dance mode, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my granddaughter had requested it for her birthday. I could not find in the stores anywhere. Great Gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Daughter opened package and product didn't turn on. Replaced batteries twice. Followed packaged instructions, removed tag, and pushed the nose. Did not work. Emailed manufacture but no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Eyes different colors from each other
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over the summer for my daughter and saved it for Christmas. Almost immediately the eyes turned 2 different colors. Since how you play with it is determined by it's eye color, having 2 eye colors isn't good.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for kids.
customer_reviews.text: One of the Christmas gifts I got for my daughter, she enjoys playing with it. The sounds are kind of annoying after the 20th time she plays it, but not obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: JFM

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product is definitely defective. Gave it to my daughter as an early Christmas gift and it has a messed up voice box. Repeats things and shuts off in the middle of talking. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Pjrose

customer_reviews.title: The Kids Love These!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter received a bunch of goodies in a bag from me and this was the one thing she got SUPER excited about. It IS adorable, if I do say so myself.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is happy so I have no complaints. Works as it should. Same as the ones in stores. Fast shipping and boxed up to take a beating from mail guys slinging everything.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: Box & face is squashed. Fur feels cheap. It’s a present, so not sure if it will be fun for my niece, but I’m not holding my breath. I will add to this review if she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece for Christmas. I don’t know all what of what it does but I do know it’s not as creepy as a Furby. My niece loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks fun, short interest
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter wanted this. Looks fun but just one of those toys that does not hold interest.
customer_reviews.author: jdeta

customer_reviews.title: thought it was kinda boring.
customer_reviews.text: Cute but my daughter wasn't interested, thought it was kinda boring.
customer_reviews.author: akc643

customer_reviews.title: Instead of the original sent a fake
customer_reviews.text: 2 fakes came, terrible quality, without accessories and instructions! I can not return, because sending back is expensive, and Amazon does not send the contract code for the transport company, and without this, the transport company does not accept the goods ( toys are not working and it is clear that the bad
customer_reviews.author: Roza

customer_reviews.title: Did not work. Broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two back in August for my granddaughters for Christmas. I purchased early because it was supposed to be a hot item. It doesn’t work. We tried everything to get it to work. My granddaughter was heartbroken. My other granddaughter got to play with hers. I would like a full refund for the pomsie that does NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive pet
customer_reviews.text: It is fun to interact with & it does not have annoying sounds. All sounds are soft & at an ideal volume. This toy is everything promised in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: This toy has a lot of functions
customer_reviews.text: Review written by an 11 y/o who got this for Christmas: “It’s cute, kinda like a Hatchimal only less creepy and more cute. It purrs. But how does it eat?”
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Lacewell

customer_reviews.title: Pamsies
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it I liked, cuteness, price, replay ability, interaction, all in one and enjoyable for the kids for their age, great toy
customer_reviews.author: Ammon

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Box was a little bent but the product itself was good
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Overly complicated
customer_reviews.text: Super annoying, kind of like a cheap furby. The fact that you have to keep the directions around to figure out what the color of their eyes mean and what you’re supposed to do with them is frustrating! My 4 year old can’t figure out on her own what to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Hays

customer_reviews.title: Wish this did more.
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute. Reminiscent of the Furby days. Doesn’t do much so kids got bored after a few days. Eventually ran out of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Giving it three stars because it is super cute and does work but my daughter literally put it down within a few seconds. She’s almost 2.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a 4 year olds birthday for one of my kids class mates. Whenever she sees me she still talks about it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy. Happy niece-happy aunt
customer_reviews.text: My niece (4yo) loves it. As soo. As she opened it she was carrying it, combing it and playing around with it. It looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: DaysMoon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your cat lover!
customer_reviews.text: These are darling my girls ages 9 and 2 loved them. I love all the colors their eyes change. And the cute noises it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. My child eh the jury’s out on that.
customer_reviews.text: I may like this toy more than my daughter does. It is super cute though and lives up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work and too late to return Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Unfortunately, I bought for Christmas and by the time daughter opened it, too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly love
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy, ordered it for my 4 yr olds bday and she absolutly loves it, well worth the money, good quality and she carries it every where . eyes light up and change color ,reacts to pets and has a cute little voice.
customer_reviews.author: pastel

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Niece loved it, vibrant colors, loved the eye color changes, loud enough to hear but not too noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimb

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 Year old granddaughter loves this toy. The purring is really cute but not loud enough to be annoying
customer_reviews.author: kayscrochet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this fluffy toy. Always amazed me what, even small, toys can do now.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mikles

customer_reviews.title: Pawsie
customer_reviews.text: I love how cute it is, But it doesn't work all the time, you really have to play with the batteries
customer_reviews.author: jeanine smith

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really liked it, reminds me of last years Fingerling as it makes the same sounds. Cute for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute critter; however, it’s fur and face were very smushed upon arrival. Luckily it came with its own brush to fix its fur.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my granddaughters birthday and she loved it. The colors are her favorite and it’s so soft and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: Cjs59

customer_reviews.title: Interactive and fun
customer_reviews.text: Daughter's favorite Chritmas gift, she likes the dance mode best...oh and when it farts lol
customer_reviews.author: FancyPants

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not the big deal they were made out to be.
customer_reviews.author: LanaLoo

customer_reviews.title: Christmas will be fun at our house.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. My granddaughters will love these products. They are Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas present for 8 year old granddaughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Promise
customer_reviews.text: Bought fir both granddaughters. They were excited at first but tired of them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jo Foster

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Way cuter than I thought would be. They baby loved the color changing eyes
customer_reviews.author: patobrien

customer_reviews.title: Pomsies
customer_reviews.text: Very cute my granddaughter loves hers .It is all they said it was .
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gayle Latner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Its small and doesn't do much, not worth what they charge for it. my daughter played with it for maybe 10 minutes, its now in her toybox, untouched since Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific toy!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 5 year old nieces favorate birthday gift! She proptly named it Lila said she would always love it and took it to bed with here that night. It is a really sweet toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It entertained for about a week before Interest was lost, bit I wasn't surprised.
customer_reviews.author: hatch713

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy
customer_reviews.text: This was soft and fluffy. Was one of her favorite toys she got
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It did not work even changed the batteries and it still did not work
customer_reviews.author: Wanda JoAnn Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Pomsie
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this pomsie. My great granddaughter is using it now.
customer_reviews.author: mazzy

customer_reviews.title: great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and just what my daughter wanted for her birthday. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute but my 3 year old lost interest in it really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter played with for a few minutes and never touched it again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this for her birthday she plays with it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Justin Carter

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter who is 6 going on 7 wasn't all that impressed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boedeker

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas present for my 8 year old granddaughter. She absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Happy.
customer_reviews.text: It's a Christmas gift but very happy with how fast I got the item.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelle

customer_reviews.title: Love This Toy
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loved this toy. It is so fluffy and soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.author: Janet Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present so it stayed wrapped for about two months. When it was finally opened it didn't work. Disappointing since I was unable to return.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: All goods are original and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: All order received. All goods are original and well packaged. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Artem Lysak

customer_reviews.title: Pomsies
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little cat. Was'nt what I expected but like it very much. I just hope it does what the advertisement says. Will devise of the result when my granddaughter opens it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pomsies Patches Plush Interactive Toys, White/Pink/Mint
product_meta.description: Pomsies are loveable, fashionable, interactive pom Pom pets You can take anywhere. Each pomsie has soft, cuddly fur and a tail that wraps around your wrist, hair, clothing and more! Pomsies are loveable, fashionable, interactive pom Pom pets You can take anywhere. Each pomsie has soft, cuddly fur and a tail that wraps around your wrist, hair, clothing and more!
feature_bullets: Pomsies will tell you when they feel tired, cold or Hungry with adorable light up eyes, purring and cute sounds…only you can give them what they need!
Take it to a new level with a special freeze dance mode you can Play with you and your friends!
Reacts to touch! Light up eyes communicate how they feel!
Touch sensors – pet them, hug them, love them. Over 50 cute sounds!
Twist and lock tail - a great accessory for your backpack, wrist, hair and more!Contained Battery Type:Carbon Zinc

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars675 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
